title: Daemon
html:
Daemon

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ Daemon
Difficulty 54
Attacks Weapon 1d8 physical, Weapon 1d8 physical, Touch 4d6 life drain, Touch 6d6 cold, Cast 0d9 mage spell, Passive 9d9 fire
@ Daemon
Difficulty 54
Attacks

Weapon 1d8 physical, Weapon 1d8 physical, Touch 4d6 life drain, Touch 6d6 cold, Cast 0d9 mage spell, Passive 9d9 fire

Base level 45
Base experience 2634
Speed 9
Base AC -9
Base MR 99
Alignment 15 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 100
Size medium
Resistances fire, cold, sleep, shock, poison
Resistances conveyed fire, cold

Daemon:

  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is a human.
  • is an elf.
  • is an orc.
  • is an overlord to its kind.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • waits for you to come.
  • has infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • may turn against you when tame.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
